name: C-Wars: Roguelike Pixel Art PC Game
blurb: What happens when Cyberpunk apocalypse roguelike meets RTS in pixel art? C-Wars!

rewards.reward: No Reward

ONI-Buddy
=============================
C-Wars Wallpapers + a HUGE thank you from our entire team. May the Pixel God be with you.

=============================
NOTES FOR REWARDS: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ C-Wars will be DRM-free and be available for PC, Mac, Linux and Android. C-Wars will be localized for English, French, Japanese and Chinese. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
[SOLO reward] means can't be combined with other SOLO rewards.
S-SPADE - Retro gamer\r\n============================= PC or Android full game DRM-free copy [Suggested retail price is $15]
B-SPADE - FCFS Special weapon\r\n=============================\r\nFor Early backers. All above + a backers-only weapon
B-SPADE - Special weapon\r\n=============================\r\nAll above + a backers-only weapon
O-Spring - More hero\r\n============================= \r\nAll above + a hidden hero
O-Spring - Explorer ============================= All above + 12 unelected special weapons in the game. Find them and unlock them by confronting insane challenges.
O-Spring - Music lover\r\n============================= \r\nAll above + Digital Sound Tracks

TAU-B - Steam Greenlight special\r\n============================= \r\nGo vote for us on Steam Greenlight. If we get greenlit, you will have a DRM-free copy + OST + ALL FREE DLC of C-Wars in the future. If we can't get greenlit on the release day, you still get ALL above rewards.  [SOLO reward]
Sidix - Catch'em all\r\n============================= \r\nAll above + ALL hidden heroes OR ALL special weapons

TAU-A - Pixel YOU ============================= Catch'em all + a Pixel version of YOU illustrated by our Art Director, based on a photo you provide. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ (This pixel you will not appear in C-Wars, it's really just made for you exclusively. But please allow us to use your pixel version [not your photo] to promote the game later. You can get this in August. Yeah, before the release of the game!)

S-TAU-B - Civilian YOU ============================= Catch'em all + a Pixel version of YOU illustrated AND animated by our Art Director, based on a photo you provide. You will become a civilian in the game. This Civilian YOU will have all civilian's animations.\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nCivilians can\u2019t fight or bite, so what\u2019s special about it? Well, the special part is you! Because you will be seeing yourself as a Luna citizen in C-Wars! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ (You don't know when and where the game summons you, but when it does, screenshot it and share it on twitter to surprise your Friends/BF/GF/Family!)

S-TAU-B - Zombie YOU ============================= Catch'em all + a ZOMBIE version of YOU, illustrated AND animated by our Art Director, based on a photo you provide. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ As an actor in C-Wars, the ZOMBIE you's job is to act, think, and BITE as a zombie. This Zombie YOU will have all the animations + attacks. Isn't it great that every player on this planet can notice your presence in the game? The downside is that they WILL notice you and target you with a higher priority, but they are right, coz you are stronger than the others.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You still don't know when and where you will fight the player, but you know one thing: you are not GONE-TURBE. This is your world, regeneration guaranteed!

S-TAU-B - Soldier YOU ============================= Catch'em all + a Soldier version of YOU, illustrated AND animated by our Art Director, based on a photo you provide. You will become a badass Soldier in the game. This Soldier YOU will have all the animations within the unit (hell yeah, all the attacks!!). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ People around the world will have a chance to summon you, you just don\u2019t know when and where. They can summon you twice or more in one combat. You will become an official in-game soldier-model! And you know what? You are stronger than regular ones!!! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Choose whatever existed summoned soldier you want to be, but we won\u2019t let you fight without an armor, coz Luna's actor union will sue our pants off if we do.

S7-ACE - Gunsmith =============================\r\nCatch'em all +Design a weapon, choose among 12 different options. You can provide reasonable weapon statistics and descriptions. All the players may obtain this weapon in the game. In order to make sure your design functions well and fits the whole art style, we have the rights to make necessary changes in statistics and modeling. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You can choose the availability of this weapon: for everyone in Luna? for S7? for LDF? Or, for only Fenrir?  It's totally your decision.

S7-ACE - Pharmacist =============================\r\nCatch'em all +Design a drug. You can provide reasonable drug statistics and descriptions. All the players may obtain this item in the game. In order to make sure your design functions well and fits the whole art style, we have the rights to make necessary changes in statistics and modeling.

Civilian - Gourmet =============================\r\nCatch'em all + Design a food. You can provide reasonable + original food statistics and descriptions. All the players may obtain this item in the game. In order to make sure your design functions well and fits the whole art style, we have the rights to make necessary changes in statistics and modeling.

S-TAU-A - Warrior YOU =============================\r\nGunsmith  + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You're not a summoned soldier; you're a S7 warrior! Players will find you in a special encounter in the game. Although you're not a hero, you can still join the players team as a strong wingman. You can't be summoned, but you're UNIQUE and stronger than those summoned soldiers. Players will want to protect you. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You need to choose an existing soldier's class and provide a photo of yours for us to make the pixel you [more detailed but reasonable customization] and your HD portrait. You will have a different attack, a weapon from the Soldier You, and choose another one from the three types of weapons Onipunks assigns you. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will have your very own name and may even become key to some special encounters. You won't know what we would make until you start playing. Let us surprise you!

S-TAU-A - Wanderer YOU =============================\r\nGunsmith  + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You're a warrior! You\u2019re a left-behind "bad guy" soldier from LDF or Cyber-Lover. Players will find you in a special encounter in the game. You're not a hero in C-Wars; you're one of the villains. But the Wanderer You may be persuaded by players to join the team to save the world.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You need to choose an existing soldier's class and provide a photo of yours for us to make the pixel you [more detailed but reasonable customization] and your HD portrait. You will have a different attack, a weapon from the Soldier You, and choose another one from the three types of weapons Onipunks assigns you.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You will have your very own name and may even become key to some special events. You won't know what we would make until you start playing. Let us surprise you!

TAU-S - Hero YOU

=============================  GunSmith + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~You are a S7 HERO like Fenrir. Player can find you in special encounter. Then they can unlock and recruit you. Provide a photo of yours and choose a class. We will do: A concept art; A portrait; Pixel YOU; A special attack + a normal attack based on your description; A special skill; A special encounter based your description; Your lines based on your descriptions; Your relationships with other organizations [Hate mutants? Hate Cyber-Lover? Got a BF/GF in LDF?] 

Player can choose YOU to start the journey after unlocking you. As all heroes [Original C-Wars Heroes/Villains, Special guests], you will be part of All-Star mode.

TAU-S - Villain YOU ============================= GunSmith + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You are a LDF/Cyber-Lover Villain like Tyrfing. Player can find you in special encounter. Then they need persuade you to unlock and recruit you. Provide a photo of yours and choose a class. We will do: A concept art; A portrait; Pixel YOU; A special attack + a normal attack based on your description; A special skill; A special encounter based your description; Your lines based on your descriptions; Your relationships with other organizations [Love mutants? Hate LDF? Know someone in S7?] \r\n\r\nPlayer can choose YOU to start the journey after unlocking you. As all villains [Original C-Wars Heroes/Villains, Special guests], you will be part of All-Star mode.
